patterns: How do I return a product?
responses: We accept returns within 30 days of purchase. Please visit our returns page for more info.
You can return products within 30 days in their original packaging.

patterns: How do I get a refund?
When will I get my refund?
responses: Refunds are processed within 5-7 business days after we receive the returned product.
Your refund will be credited to your original payment method within 7 business days.

patterns: What payment methods do you accept?
responses: We accept credit cards, debit cards, PayPal, and UPI payments.
Yes! We accept Visa, MasterCard, PayPal, and more.
We offer free shipping for orders above $50.
Standard shipping charges apply for orders under $50.

responses: Please provide your order ID so I can check if it's eligible for cancellation.

Our hours are 9 AM to 8 PM, Monday–Saturday.

patterns: How do I contact customer support?
responses: You can call us at 123-456-7890 or email support@example.com.
Reach our support team at 123-456-7890.

patterns: I am not happy with the service
responses: I'm sorry to hear that. Please share the details of your complaint so we can resolve it.
